Add app to list of unique apps

Source: R/include_svelte.R
add_app.Rd

Add app to list of unique apps

add_app(name)

Arguments

name

:: String, name of the app to check for uniqueness in the current session. New names will be added to a vector in an environemt called svelte_apps.

Value

Boolean value for if the app is a new app.
